remarks: The trace of the converse of a lattice translation.  (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2013.)
statement:
trlcnv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlcnv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcnv.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcnv $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( R ` `' F ) = ( R ` F ) ) $.
